casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Terry Lee DIX. No. 551P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 18, 2008. Charles Reece, Assistant Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State of NC,

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 669 S.E.2d 25.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of December 2008 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of December 2008."
